ryu_config._commit: this is the topology of this switch

struct of controller config._commit1: The key word can't be changed
struct of controller config._commit2: Add the contoller in the controller_config_list
struct of controller config.server_udp_port: The port this kind of server used
struct of controller config.coap_data_ipv4: The ip address you want to use to get the coap data from ryu
struct of controller config.coap_data_port: The port you want to use to get the coap data from ryu
struct of controller config.heartbeat_ipv4: The ip address you want to use to get heartbeat
struct of controller config.heartbeat_port: The port you want to use to get the heartbeat
